meanings.definition: A person who achieves the highest score or rank in a competition or examination.
meanings.sent1: The topnotchers in the spelling bee received shiny trophies.
meanings.sent2: The school celebrates the topnotchers in the math contest every year.
meanings.sent3: The topnotchers in the race were so fast, they seemed like cheetahs.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication made her a topnotcher in the science fair, standing out like a bright star.
meanings.sent5: The topnotchers' names were engraved on the prestigious plaque.

meanings.definition: The act of achieving the highest score or rank in a competition or examination.
meanings.sent1: The announcement of the topnotchers brought cheers from the audience.
meanings.sent2: Hard work and determination are key to becoming one of the topnotchers.
meanings.sent3: The topnotchers ceremony felt like a grand celebration of success.
meanings.sent4: Reaching the topnotchers level requires consistent effort and focus.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of being among the topnotchers is truly rewarding.
